definition: blog article/to write a blog article (netspeak)
ITŌ Hirobumi (1841-1909), Japanese Meiji restoration politician, prime minister on four occasions, influential in Japanese expansionism in Korea, assassinated in Harbin
vigorously pursuing knowledge, while scrupulously abiding by the rules of decorum (idiom)

sentences.english: This created an interesting back-and-forth on the comments section of the article. For instance,  Mike Amundsen states
sentences.chinese: 這篇博文引起了一組有趣的來來回回的評論。

sentences.english: The clue to the wrongness is in the title of the blog.
sentences.chinese: 錯誤的信號在博文的題目中。

sentences.english: In my next letter I will explain better and give you more exemple .
sentences.chinese: 在我的下一篇博文，我會解釋，並給予您更多的例子。

sentences.english: THIS POSTexplains in more detail how to add fog.
sentences.chinese: 這篇博文更詳細地說明了如何添加霧景。

sentences.english: By the way, I sure try my best to publish fabulous passages and perfect photos.
sentences.chinese: 我會盡力發表精品博文和上傳精彩的盤景圖片。

sentences.english: Are you writing a post that teaches the reader something new?
sentences.chinese: 你是在寫一篇告訴讀者什麼新鮮事的博文嗎？

sentences.english: Periodically submit your best blog posts to the appropriate carnivals for your niche.
sentences.chinese: 定期地將你最好的博文推薦到博文互享上去。

sentences.english: Periodically submit your best blog posts to the appropriate carnivals for your niche.
sentences.chinese: 定期地將你最好的博文推薦到博文互享上去。

sentences.english: Since 2002, he has been Distinguished Professor-at-large of The Chinese University of Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 從2002年起，他任香港中文大學博文講座教授。

sentences.english: As a foodie, most of Youyou's posts are related to food.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一枚喫貨，悠悠的大部分博文都和喫有關。

sentences.english: Navneetji, your each blog and photo on China is an eye-opener.
sentences.chinese: 你有關中國的每篇博文和圖片真是令人開眼界。

sentences.english: Why should I mention him in my first blog post?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我會在自己的第一篇博文中提到他？

sentences.english: And then Answers in Genesis responded to my posting.
sentences.chinese: 此外還有“創世記的答案”網站對我博文的迴應。

sentences.english: Li Bowen, male, 31, Product Director, in this profession for 7 years.
sentences.chinese: 李博文，男，31歲，產品總監，從事本行業7年。

sentences.english: This posting has outlined the basic structure of VIEs using a typical example.
sentences.chinese: 這篇博文通過一個典型樣本概述了VIE的基本結構。

definition: to issue a document/document issued by an authority/outgoing messages/(Internet) to post an article online
tweet (on Twitter)/(HK, Tw) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/to reply to original poster (or recommend a post) on PTT bulletin board
to quote/to cite/to recommend/to appoint/(computing) reference
(after completing a game of chess) to replay the game, analyzing the players' moves/(stock market) to resume trading
to transmit/to forward (mail, SMS, packets of data)/to pass on/to republish (an article from another publication)
